item.title: Camlink (4k) Linux Test
item.description: The Problem While the Elgato Camlink 4k works with Linux in principle, there are a few quirks to be aware of. While it works fine in OBS, other software (such as Discord and Microsoft Teams) struggles to use it, usually resulting in only showing a black screen in the webcam preview. The Solution To alleviate this, we will need 2 components: v4l2loopback and ffmpeg. v4l2loopback allows us create dummy devices that can then be used to show custom video content as a webcam.
